content: this cute labubu keychain is always with you ✨ wherever you go it will add a little magic to your day create your own toy with this detailed crochet pattern the pattern includes detailed instructions making it perfect for beginners the finished toy is approximately 2 3 inches skill level intermediate materials yarn - yarn art jeans - 50g/160m 55% cotton 45% polyacrylic light brown color 87 dark gray color 28 light pink color 78 milky color 03 alize softy - 50g/115m 100% polyester hook - 1 5mm 2mm eyes on safe mount - 8 mm nose on safe mount - 8 mm toy stuffing markers needle for sewing embroidery the digital pattern is available in rus / eng languages
